mapper.select: SELECT a.pcode, b.pcode, a.pcount , b.pname, b.price, b.org_filename FROM tbl_cart a INNER JOIN tbl_product b ON b.pcode=#{pcode} AND a.pcode=#{pcode} AND a.customer=#{customer}
select username, telno, address, email from tbl_member where userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_cart SET isorder = 'y' WHERE pcode = #{pcode} AND customer=#{customer}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order (order_code,customer,pcode,pcount,address) SELECT tbl_order_seq.nextval, a.customer, a.pcode, a.pcount, b.address FROM tbl_cart a INNER JOIN tbl_member b ON a.customer = b.userid WHERE a.isorder = 'y'
mapper.update: update (select a.stock, b.pcount from tbl_product a, tbl_cart b where a.pcode=b.pcode and b.customer=#{customer}) set stock = stock-pcount
update (select a.pcount, b.order_quantity from tbl_cart a, tbl_product b where b.pcode=a.pcode) set order_quantity = order_quantity+pcount
mapper.select: select count(order_code) from tbl_order where customer = #{customer}

SELECT a.order_code, a.pcount, a.state as state, a.order_date AS order_date, b.org_filename , b.pname, b.price as price FROM tbl_order a INNER JOIN tbl_product b ON a.customer = #{customer} AND a.pcode = b.pcode ORDER BY order_date DESC
